---
title: "NotteClient"
description: "Client for the Notte API"
---



Note: this client is only able to handle one session at a time.
If you need to handle multiple sessions, you need to create a new client for each session

## Methods

### health_check

```python
health_check()
```

Health check the Notte API

---

### scrape

```python
scrape(url: <class 'str'>, data: *<class 'notte_sdk.types.ScrapeRequestDict'>) -> str | notte_core.data.space.StructuredData[BaseModel] | list[notte_core.data.space.ImageData]
```

Scrape the current page data

**Parameters:**

- `url`: The URL to scrape.
- `**data`: Additional parameters for the scrape.

**Returns:**

The scraped data.

---



## Module

`notte_sdk.client`
